HeroSection.title: Your Style, Our Craft
HeroSection.para: Step into elegance with our custom tailoring services! We specialize in creating stylish and comfortable outfits just for you. Whether it's for a special occasion or everyday wear, we bring your vision to life with love and precision. Discover the perfect fit today!

AboutSection.title: Crafting Elegance, Stitching Memories
AboutSection.content: At Dilkush Design, we specialize in transforming fabric into beautiful attire that speaks to tradition and style. Serving the women of Orangi Town, we blend modern techniques with classic craftsmanship to create dresses that celebrate your unique taste. Every stitch tells a story, and our passion is to make each piece as memorable as the occasion itâ€™s worn for

PricingPage.subheader: Choose the plan that fits your needs best.

questions.question: What services do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer custom tailoring, alterations, and repairs for all types of garments. We also provide style consultations to help you find the perfect fit.

questions.question: How long does it take to tailor a suit?
questions.answer: Typically, a custom suit takes between two to three weeks to complete, depending on fabric availability and customization needs. We can provide faster turnaround times upon request.

questions.question: What fabrics do you use?
questions.answer: We use high-quality fabrics such as wool, cotton, linen, and silk sourced from trusted suppliers. We also offer eco-friendly fabric options upon request.

questions.question: How do I schedule a fitting appointment?
questions.answer: You can schedule a fitting by calling us at +92 345 3155319 or emailing us at codewithsaffy@gmail.com. Appointments can also be booked through our website.

questions.question: Do you offer online consultations?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide virtual consultations via video calls. Simply book an appointment, and our tailor will assist you remotely with all your tailoring needs.

questions.question: Where is your store located?
questions.answer: We are located near Islamic City Model School, Orangi Town, Karachi.

questions.question: What are your operating hours?
questions.answer: Our store is open from Monday to Saturday, 10 AM to 8 PM. We are closed on Sundays.
